name: Insomnium (FaberLudi)
description:
A group of unconventional heroes suddenly falls into a deep sleep, finding themselves trapped in their own nightmares.

They can only run away from the monsters that populate them; help them escape their head-maze, before they're trapped there forever.

Insomnium is set in... your head. You're trapped in a nightmare, and you have to find the exit of your head-maze.

Each maze will be different, but don't worry: each character has a unique power that can be used for survival.

You'll have to dodge the enemies running around the map, each of which has a power as well. Traps will also hinder your journey, so be careful!

Features:
- 3 playable characters
- 3 different maps
- Procedurally-generated levels
- Immersive atmosphere and sound design

Notes:
- Use F to toggle fullscreen

Credits:
- FaberLudi: programming, game design
- Foeniculum: art design
- Noizenecio: sound design

Developed using Godot Engine.
